name: Cardano Crocs Club
description: To fund the ecosystem of dApps including everything from defi to gaming to future market place. Products so far include a Swap for over 800 tokens, a payment portal to allow business to accept C4, image generator, VPN service, file hosting, community funded investment opportunities, and bonds among other things as well as games such as our V2 custom poker platform and other smaller games built by other projects and community members.
